Hero.title: The Cultural Copilot for Drivers
Hero.subtitle: Turn every kilometer into a contextual discovery. Zero screens, zero traffic violations.

Simulator.title: 100% Hands-Free Contextual Triggering
Simulator.subtitle: Our City OS engine uses bearing-logic and offline caching to trigger narratives exactly at the right monument, without the driver ever looking at a screen.

EnterpriseFork.b2gDesc: City OS provides narrative sovereignty, structural tourism mapping, and guaranteed legal compliance safely delivered at the wheel.
EnterpriseFork.b2bDesc: Transform your fleet into automated local guides. Drive zero CAPEX and secure massive ancillary revenue streams.

Hero.title: The Definitive Infrastructure for Smart Tourism Destinations (DTI).
Hero.subtitle: Transform your city into a certified Smart Destination. TUGGI City OS aligns your territorial governance with global pillars of Technology, Sustainability, Accessibility, and Data.

Regulatory.title: 100% Street-Legal & Risk-Free.
Regulatory.desc: Endorsing screen-based tourism apps exposes the municipality to traffic violation liabilities. TUGGI's native 100% hands-free architecture guarantees legal compliance, protecting the Mayor's management and the citizens.

Sustainability.title: Sustainability & Public Utility
Sustainability.desc: Redirect traffic and communicate efficiently without screen barriers.
Sustainability.feat1Desc: Use AI triggers to actively redirect tourists from saturated historical centers to peripheral economic zones.
Sustainability.feat2Desc: Deploy dynamic audio geofences for road closures, events, or severe weather alerts, communicating with foreign drivers in their native language hands-free.

Accessibility.title: Universal Accessibility
Accessibility.desc: Universal Accessibility is the hardest DTI pillar. TUGGI solves sensory barriers instantly: Audio-first navigation for visually impaired tourists, and geolocated Closed Captions for hearing-impaired passengers. WCAG 2.1 AA compliant.

Intelligence.title: Data-Driven Tourism Intelligence
Intelligence.desc: Governments are usually blind to tourist flow. TUGGI delivers anonymized telemetry: know exactly which routes are taken, at what times, and in which languages, enabling hyper-targeted international marketing campaigns.
Intelligence.heatmapsDesc: Real-time density graphs for any active route.
Intelligence.demographicsDesc: Know exact demographics via active audio streams.

Mandate.title: Zero CAPEX Deployment & Mega-Event Readiness
Mandate.desc: Distribute the OS without digital marketing spend: QR codes on official parking meters, highway toll booths, and historical access totems. Instant plug-and-play readiness for massive influxes like the 2026 Winter Games or World Cup.

Hero.title: De-commoditize Your Fleet. Boost Your RevPA.
Hero.subtitle: Transform a standard vehicle rental into a Premium Cultural Experience. Generate massive ancillary revenue with zero hardware investment and near-zero infrastructure costs.

Financial.col1Desc: Replace dead GPS rental revenue with a scalable software-as-a-service margin driver.
Financial.col2Desc: Near-Zero Entry Cost: No specialized hardware to buy or maintain. The model is 100% BYOD (Bring Your Own Device), eliminating battery swaps and equipment depreciation.
Financial.col3Desc: Deploy across your entire national fleet in 24 hours via QR Code integration at the counter.

Risk.title: Maximize Uptime. Minimize Liability.
Risk.desc: Driver distraction is a major cause of fleet damage. TUGGI's 100% hands-free, audio-only triggers keep the driver's eyes on the road. Reduce minor collisions and vehicle downtime in workshops. Safety is not just a feature; it's an operational saving.

NPS.title: The War on NPS: From Metal to Experience.
NPS.desc: In a commoditized market, the winner is the one who provides the best journey. TUGGI turns the rental car into a private local guide, exploding customer satisfaction and brand loyalty.

Brand.title: Your Brand, Our Engine.
Brand.desc: Offer a unique experience without the constraints of tech exclusivity. We provide White-Label and Co-branded interfaces. Customize the app's voice, colors, and even create 'Exclusive Premium Routes' sponsored by your rental brand to differentiate from competitors.

ESG.title: Seamless Digital Deployment
ESG.desc: Your only investment is in digital activation and on-site signage (QR displays), which typically ROI on day one of rentals. Cultivate your ESG targets by fostering the local creative economy and decompressing overtourism through guided routes.

Hero.title: Enterprise-Grade Spatial Audio Infrastructure.
Hero.subtitle: Built for scale, resilience, and absolute security. Discover the architecture powering the world's first 100% hands-free contextual routing engine.

Engine.title: Precision Geofencing & Vector Filtering.
Engine.desc: Standard GPS creates false positives. TUGGI uses directional bearing-logic to ensure narratives trigger ONLY when the vehicle is physically facing the POI.

Offline.title: Zero Connectivity Reliance.
Offline.desc: IT departments fear dead zones. TUGGI utilizes aggressive offline-first caching. The entire narrative package of a city is pre-fetched locally on the device (via Wi-Fi at the hotel or rental desk), guaranteeing zero playback failures on remote highways.

API.title: Seamless ERP & Booking Integration.
API.desc: Designed for Car Rental IT. TUGGI is API-first. Instantly provision licenses and sync user access the moment a customer pays for their vehicle reservation online.

Data.col1Desc: Strict adherence to European (GDPR) and South American (LGPD) data protection laws. We track flow, not individuals.
Data.col2Desc: Backed by global CDNs and an edge-computing architecture ensuring a 99.9% uptime SLA, ready to handle massive traffic spikes during events like the World Cup or Olympics without government infrastructure costs.

Governance.title: Military-Grade Governance & Audit Trails.
Governance.desc: Strict Role-Based Access Control (RBAC). The municipality or fleet has an immutable record of every action inside the City OS.

Hero.title: The Audio Guide That Drives With You.
Hero.subtitle: No scrolling. No searching. Just set your language and let your GPS trigger contextual stories as you drive. Keep your map on the screen, control your Spotify, or just put your phone away. TUGGI runs seamlessly in the background.

Behavior.title: Set It and Forget It
Behavior.step1Desc: Select from 8+ native languages for high-fidelity storytelling.
Behavior.step2Desc: Use your favorite navigation app, control your playlist, or keep the screen on for passengers to read the Closed Captions. TUGGI works its magic in the background without interrupting your flow.
Behavior.step3Desc: Stories trigger automatically as you cross geofences.

Features.title: The Traveler's Survival Kit
Features.feat1Desc: Download the city pack at your hotel. Zero data roaming charges on the road.
Features.feat2Desc: Audio warnings before you enter restricted traffic zones or dangerous areas, saving you hundreds in fines.
Features.feat4Desc: Closed Captions and text-reading options synchronized with the audio, ensuring hearing-impaired passengers never miss a story.

Pricing.subtitle: Choose the perfect plan for your journey.
Pricing.pass1Desc: Ideal for weekend rentals and short getaways.
Pricing.pass2Desc: Ideal for cross-country road trips and extended holidays.

Terms.title: Terms of Use
Terms.intro: Welcome to TUGGI. By creating an account, logging in via partner platforms, or using our app, you expressly agree to the terms described below.
Terms.s1Item1: Minimum Age: TUGGI is a cultural and educational application. The minimum age to create an account and use the service as a listener is 13 years old.
Terms.s1Item2: Responsibility at the Wheel: If you are the driver of the vehicle, you represent and warrant that you are of legal age and possess the necessary license required by the laws of your country or state to drive.
Terms.s1Item3: Data Accuracy: You agree not to create accounts on behalf of third parties or use false identities.
Terms.s2Title: 2. The Golden Rule: Traffic Liability Disclaimer (Safety First)
Terms.s2Item1: TUGGI was strictly designed to operate in the background (hands-free).
Terms.s2Item2: You are solely responsible for driving the vehicle. The app does not replace your attention to the road, traffic signs, or traffic conditions.
Terms.s2Item3: TUGGI Technologies, as well as its government and corporate partners, fully disclaim any responsibility for accidents, material/physical damage, or traffic fines incurred during the use of the application. Always respect local traffic laws.
Terms.s3Item1: Location Signals: Our spatial trigger engine depends on third-party GPS signals and collaborative mapping (such as OpenStreetMap). We do not guarantee absolute trigger accuracy in network shadow areas, such as tunnels or deep valleys.
Terms.s3Item2: AI-Assisted Content: Our audio narratives are compiled and generated using a combination of manual curation and advanced Artificial Intelligence (AI) models. The narrated content is cultural and educational in nature. TUGGI provides the content "as-is" and does not guarantee absolute academic, historical, or geographical accuracy, and is not responsible for factual discrepancies.
Terms.s4Text: We are committed to maintaining a respectful and accurate cultural environment. If you find incorrect information, cultural inaccuracies, or if you are the owner of a location and wish to request the removal of a Point of Interest (POI), use our Support Channel on the Contact page (selecting the "Tourist / Support" option). Our team reviews all feedback and reserves the right to correct, alter, or remove triggers at our sole discretion.
Terms.s5Text: When using the application in public transport, pedestrian paths, or shared vehicles, we request the use of headphones or the prior consent of other passengers.
Terms.s6Item1: Travel Passes (e.g., 7 or 30 days) are digital consumer products.
Terms.s6Item2: App Stores: Purchases made via Apple App Store or Google Play are subject exclusively to the Terms of Service and Refund Policies of those respective platforms.
Terms.s6Item3: Local Legislation: We respect the 7-day Right of Withdrawal (Brazilian Consumer Defense Code - CDC), applicable only when the purchase is processed directly through our web systems, and strictly if the digital service has not been partially or fully consumed (use of audio triggers).
Terms.s7Text: These Terms of Use are governed by the laws of the Federative Republic of Brazil. The courts of the District of São Paulo, State of São Paulo, are chosen to resolve any controversies arising from the use of TUGGI, with express waiver of any other.

Privacy.title: Privacy Policy
Privacy.intro: TUGGI Technologies values your privacy. This policy describes how we collect, use, protect, and handle your data, in strict compliance with the General Data Protection Law (LGPD - Brazil) and the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR - European Union).
Privacy.s1Intro: For TUGGI to function as your cultural copilot, we collect minimal and essential information:
Privacy.s1Item1: Account and Authentication Data: When creating an account via email or partner providers (Google, Apple, Facebook), we receive basic profile data (Name, Email, and user ID generated by our secure Supabase infrastructure).
Privacy.s1Item2: Geolocation Data (GPS): TUGGI requires real-time location access (including in the background) to trigger audio exactly when you cross a Point of Interest (POI).
Privacy.s1Item3: Usage and Telemetry Data: We collect information about application interactions, such as which audios were played, selected languages, and system stability metrics.
Privacy.s2Title: 2. How We Use Your Data (Anonymized Telemetry)
Privacy.s2Item1: Service Operation: We use your location strictly to calculate the direction vector and proximity to cultural triggers, ensuring audio delivery at the correct timing.
Privacy.s2Item2: Territorial Intelligence (The B2G Standard): Geolocation and audio playback data are de-linked from your personal identity (anonymized) before being stored for flow analysis. We provide aggregated reports to Governments and Rental Companies (e.g., "How many plays occurred at monument X today") without ever exposing who the user was. We track cultural flows, not individuals.
Privacy.s3Item1: We do not sell your data. TUGGI does not trade Personally Identifiable Information (PII) with data brokers or ad networks.
Privacy.s3Item2: We share data only with infrastructure providers strictly necessary for the app to function, such as secure cloud services (e.g., Supabase for database/authentication and Google Cloud for the Text-to-Speech engine). These partners operate under strict confidentiality agreements.
Privacy.s4Item1: We employ end-to-end encryption in transit and at rest. Access to corporate databases and the City OS dashboard is protected by Role-Based Access Control (RBAC), ensuring data isolation.
Privacy.s4Item2: We retain your personal data only for as long as necessary to provide the service. Anonymized telemetry data may be retained permanently for product improvement.
Privacy.s5Intro: You have full control over your data. At any time, you can request:
Privacy.s5Item1: Access, correction, or portability of your information.
Privacy.s5Item2: The revocation of GPS use consent (which will make the app's core functionality impossible).
Privacy.s5ItemO1: The permanent deletion of your account and personal data. To exercise this right, access our
Privacy.s5ItemO3: or use the native function within the app.
Privacy.s6P1: If you have questions about this policy or the processing of your data, please contact our Data Protection Officer (DPO) through our
Privacy.s6P3: page, by selecting the Support option.

Hero.title: Before we see, we hear.
Hero.body: Hearing is our oldest and most fundamental sense. Before we are born, we recognize the world through the sound of our mother's voice. We learn to listen before we learn to speak, read, or walk. TUGGI was born from this biological truth: the most natural way to absorb the world around us is not by staring at a screen, but by listening to it.

Freedom.title: The Freedom to Explore.
Freedom.body: Tourism has been trapped in rigid schedules, crowded buses, and language barriers. We believe exploration should be absolute freedom. You shouldn't have to wait for a tour guide or keep your eyes glued to a map app. With TUGGI, you drive, walk, or ride at your own pace. The stories find you at the exact geographical moment they matter.

Sovereignty.title: Reclaiming the Story.
Sovereignty.body: Cities have historically outsourced their memories. Narratives get lost in translation, altered by unverified human guides, or trapped in outdated books. We exist to give destinations the power to reclaim their history. A digital infrastructure where the city's true voice is preserved, curated, and delivered globally, exactly as it happened.

Values.title: The Foundation
Values.v1Desc: 100% hands-free experience. We never compete with the driver's attention.
Values.v2Desc: Zero friction. Just start the route and the app takes care of the rest.
Values.v3Desc: Stories deeply connected to the physical route and narrative coherence.
Values.v5Desc: We skip the basics to deliver the hidden gems and true local knowledge.
Values.v6Desc: Designed to be consumed across different profiles and native languages.
